mapper.select: select * from member where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into member(username, password, name, phone, email, enabled) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{enabled})
insert into member_role (username, id) values(#{username}, (select id from role where roleName=#{roleName}))
insert into memberfiles(username, fileName, oriName) values(#{username}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
